column5: Took the family out fishing last night and had a great time catching some smallies and northerns The river is low right now and the kids have agreat time exploring the shoreline My son landed two nice smallies and I managed a couple as well while my wife got some great pics
Some great pictures!  Looks like a great night out with the kids.  dk
Good stuff Rickster. Thanks for sharing.
Great pics Rick. Looks like the young lad is getting the hang of posing for pics. He'sgot the technique down pat!! Very nice!
Nice report. Looks like great fishing waters and a nice and quiet place.
The smiles say it all.  Its always worth it when you can put a smile on the kids' faces.
